segments.text: I notice the girl reaching up for a cookie, and it’s actually kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s waiting for the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, and I’m worried he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re working together to get those cookies without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so wobbly, but they don’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how determined they are to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of their little mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught—or hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a mix of mischief and innocence.
segments.speaker: PAR
